actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to increase the authorization of the National Transportation Safety Board through fiscal year 2020, to require the NTSB to investigate major oil and other hazardous materials derailments, to expand the Secretary of Transportation's emergency order authority, and to require the Secretary of Transportation to establish a volatility standard for crude oil transported by rail.
short_title: Mandate Oil Spill Investigations and Emergency Rules (MOSIER) Act of 2016

titles.title: Mandate Oil Spill Investigations and Emergency Rules (MOSIER) Act of 2016

A bill to increase the authorization of the National Transportation Safety Board through fiscal year 2020, to require the NTSB to investigate major oil and other hazardous materials derailments, to expand the Secretary of Transportation's emergency order authority, and to require the Secretary of Transportation to establish a volatility standard for crude oil transported by rail.
Mandate Oil Spill Investigations and Emergency Rules (MOSIER) Act of 2016
